title: daunjuan
author: daunjuan
content: VEGA protocol Before Alpha Mainnet is released, the Mainnet Simulations are launching on the 31st January — where your involvement strengthens the network — and can earn you a piece of up to 150k VEGA rewards.Daily and weekly competitions for 4 weeks with no risked funds since it's on testnet.Sim #1 Trading on Fairground using Vega-created trading bots — Up to 15,000 VEGA rewards totalSim #2 Trading on the Validator Testnet using Vega-created trading bots — Up to 24,000 VEGA rewards totalSim #3 Trading on Fairground using an external Market Maker — Up to 34,500 VEGA rewards totalSim #4 Trading on Validator Testnet using an external Market Maker — Up to 69,000 VEGA rewards totalRead more in the blog or register directly. Thank you for the support.https://blog.vega.xyz/build-test-earn-with-the-launch-of-mainnet-simulations-ed1546c0c4c7https://fairground.wtf/
